summary.span: 表示 控制項中的個別儲存格。

span.span: Represents an individual cell in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示中的個別資料格控制項。The class represents an individual cell in a control. 您可以擷取到的資料格的集合。You can retrieve cells through the collection of a . 資料列和資料行識別中的儲存格的位置。The row and column for a identify the cell's location in the . 典型的資料格都包含特定的資料列和資料行包含資料。A typical cell contains data specific to the row and column in which it is contained. 儲存格可以自訂數種方式，藉由設定其屬性，處理與它相關聯的事件。The cell can be customized in a number of ways by setting its properties and handling the events associated with it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個型別。The following code example illustrates the use of this type. 如需有關此範例的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 加入 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的個別資料格的工具提示](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about this example, see [How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText/cpp/datagridviewcell.tooltiptext.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText/CS/datagridviewcell.tooltiptext.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText/VB/datagridviewcell.tooltiptext.vb#1)]

When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations. You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 取得或設定與儲存格相關聯的捷徑功能表。

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the cell.

value.span: 與儲存格相關聯的 。

span.span: The associated with the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下資料格時，通常會顯示快顯功能表。This property indicates the shortcut menu that is typically displayed when the user right-clicks the cell. 當控制項屬性設定或其屬性是`true`，取得的值屬性會引發控制項事件，並傳回的值屬性，指定在事件處理常式。When the control property is set or its property is `true`, getting the value of the property raises the event of the control and returns the value of the property as specified in the event handler. 如果沒有事件處理常式，取得的值屬性會傳回先前指定的值或其預設值是`null`。If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`. 處理事件時，主要是使用大量的資料，以設定儲存格時，避免效能的負面影響多個資料格的值。Handling the event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell value for multiple cells. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 變更此屬性會引發事件上擁有，如果有的話。Changing this property raises the event on the owning , if one exists. 您也可以指定快顯功能表，針對個別資料列，而不是個別資料格，藉由設定資料列屬性或處理控制項的事件。You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row property or handling the control's event. 儲存格屬性設定會覆寫的資料列屬性設定值，而事件覆寫這兩事件和資料列屬性設定。The cell property setting overrides the row property setting, and the event overrides both the event and the row property setting. 您可以指定`null`為儲存格捷徑功能表，不過，若要防止遭到覆寫的資料列的捷徑功能表。You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常處理時，會使用屬性事件的。Typically, the property is used when handling the event of the . 如果儲存格的值失敗，某些驗證準則，設定屬性與 取消認可作業，藉由設定屬性至`true`。If the cell's value fails some validation criteria, set the property and cancel the commit operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 然後會顯示您所指定的文字，並提示使用者在儲存格的資料來修正錯誤。The text you specify is then displayed by the , and the user is prompted to fix the error in the cell's data. 當的屬性是`true`，您可以提供資料列和使用的資料格的錯誤文字和事件。When the property of the is `true`, you can provide error text for rows and cells using the and events. 當您指派不同字串的資料格中事件的控制項，就會引發。When you assign a different string to a cell, the event of the control is raised. 從.NET Framework 4.5.2 開始，錯誤圖示的調整大小取決於系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, resizing of the error icon is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性，當處理錯誤狀況，在未繫結。The following code example demonstrates how to use this property when handling error conditions in an unbound . `AnnotateCell`方法會將錯誤訊息字串設定為屬性。The `AnnotateCell` method sets an error message string to the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會呼叫這個方法，以將資料格的值轉換為相等的顯示值所表示的型別屬性。The control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the property. 控制項將儲存格的值傳遞給這個方法在`value`參數。The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter. 這個方法會引發事件。This method raises the event. 此事件處理常式可以修改`value`和`cellStyle`參數。A handler for this event can modify both the `value` and `cellStyle` parameters. 如果處理常式不會設定屬性，以`true`，不過，這個方法會格式化`value`使用的格式化屬性`cellStyle`物件。If the handler does not set the property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法不會轉換`value`要屬性值的值等於屬性值時以外的其他設定值或`null`。This method does not convert `value` to the property value for values equal to the property value when is set to a value other than or `null`. 在此情況下，您可以處理事件，以顯示屬性值。In this case, you can handle the event to display the property value. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的程式碼範例。For more information, see the code example in . 如果格式設定不成功，就會發生事件。If formatting is unsuccessful, the event occurs. 如果沒有此事件或處理常式集沒有處理常式屬性設`true`，會擲回例外狀況。If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the property to `true`, an exception is thrown. 衍生的類別覆寫這個方法通常會傳回儲存格的值的字串表示，如果`context`引數包含值。Derived classes that override this method will typically return a string representation of the cell value if the `context` argument includes the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得的值屬性自動產生新如果先前尚未存取屬性。Getting the value of the property automatically instantiates a new if the property has not previously been accessed. 因此，您必須使用屬性來判斷是否設定為執行個體。Therefore, you must use the property to determine whether the property is currently set to a instance. 這項資訊有助於判斷哪些物件的屬性所傳回屬性表示特別針對該儲存格設定的樣式。This is useful to determine which properties of the object returned by the property represent styles set specifically for the cell. 如需有關儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為最佳化技術，通常所有儲存格相同的型別，而且在同一個共用單一裝載編輯控制項。As an optimization technique, typically all the cells of the same type and in the same share a single hosted editing control. 不過，控制項用來儲存格之前，它需要初始化方法。However, before the control is used by a cell, it needs to be initialized by the method. 第一次呼叫它時，這個方法就會將控制項加入至清單的編輯控制項在其父代。The first time it is called, this method adds the control to the list of editing controls in its parent . 它也會初始化一些儲存格的視覺屬性。It also initializes some of the visual properties of the cell. 比方說，設定要比對提供的儲存格樣式參數的編輯區域的背景色彩。For example, sets the background color of the editing area to match the supplied cell style parameter. 後續呼叫不執行任何動作。Subsequent calls to do nothing. 在衍生的類別會使用這個方法來裝載的執行個體對應到其類型的類別。Derived classes use this method to host an instance of the class corresponding to their type. 例如，資料表包含一或多個物件呼叫此方法來新增單一編輯控制項擁有。For example, a table that contains one or more objects calls this method to add a single editing control to the owning . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的簡單類別，衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a simple class that derives from the class. 這個範例屬於較大的程式碼範例中所提供的[如何： 在 Windows Forms DataGridView 儲存格中的主控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#200](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#200)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#200](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#200)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法之前呼叫方法。The method is called just before the method. 它必須傳回`true`如果在呼叫具有相同引數具有若要停止共用包含儲存格的資料列的效果。It must return `true` if the call to with the same argument has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell. 否則，它應該傳回`false`。Otherwise, it should return `false`. 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否可以編輯儲存格所顯示的資料。The property indicates whether the data displayed by the cell can be edited. 您可以設定的個別儲存格，或您可以將整個資料列或資料行的資料格為唯讀藉由設定或屬性。You can set for individual cells, or you can make an entire row or column of cells read-only by setting the or properties. 根據預設，如果儲存格的父資料列或資料行設定為唯讀，則子儲存格會採用相同的值。By default, if a cell's parent row or column is set to read-only, the child cells will adopt the same value. 您可以設定連線，覆寫此預設行為個別儲存格。You can override this default behavior by setting for individual cells. 您可以瀏覽至唯讀資料格，然後您可以設定為目前的儲存格的唯讀資料格。You can navigate to a read-only cell, and you can set a read-only cell to be the current cell. 只會影響是否可編輯; 資料格它不會影響是否使用者可以刪除資料列。 only affects whether a cell is editable; it does not affect whether the user can delete rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值會顯示為工具提示的資料格上，當滑鼠指標位於儲存格上方，而屬性值不是。The value of this property is displayed as the cell ToolTip when the mouse pointer is over the cell and the property value is not . 如果這個屬性的值為、 儲存格會顯示包含儲存格的值，如果值是在儲存格顯示已截斷，否則為工具提示、 儲存格不會顯示工具提示。If the value of this property is , the cell will display a ToolTip containing the value of the cell if the value is truncated in the cell display; otherwise, the cell will not display a ToolTip. 您也可以藉由設定來防止顯示的工具提示屬性設`false`。You can also prevent the display of a ToolTip by setting the property to `false`. 當控制項屬性設定或其屬性是`true`，取得的值屬性會引發控制項事件，並傳回的值屬性，指定在事件處理常式。When the control property is set or its property is `true`, getting the value of the property raises the event of the control and returns the value of the property as specified in the event handler. 如果沒有事件處理常式，取得的值屬性會傳回先前指定的值或其預設值是。If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the property returns the previously specified value or its default value of . 處理事件時，主要是使用大量的資料，以設定儲存格時，避免效能的負面影響多個資料格的值。Handling the event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell value for multiple cells. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 變更此屬性會引發事件上擁有，如果有的話。Changing this property raises the event on the owning , if one exists. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定內的事件處理常式屬性事件。The following code example shows how to set the property within an event handler for the event. 這個範例屬於較大的程式碼範例中所提供的[如何： 加入 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的個別資料格的工具提示](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性表示儲存格是否具有的資料行或資料列在其屬性設定為`false`。This property indicates whether the cell is in a row or a column with its property set to `false`. 它不會指出是否已經出螢幕外捲動的資料格。It does not indicate whether the cell has been scrolled off-screen. 若要判斷是否在控制項的顯示區域內為可見的資料格，請使用屬性。To determine whether a cell is visible within the display area of the control, use the property.
